properties.areaDesc: West Elk and Sawatch Mountains; Grand and Battlement Mesas; Flat Tops
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 10 at 2:20PM MST until January 13 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Grand Junction CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected with lulls from time to time. Total snow
accumulations of 6 to 12 inches with locally higher amounts. Winds
gusting as high as 35 mph.

* WHERE...Grand and Battlement Mesas, West Elk and Sawatch Mountains
and Flat Tops.

* WHEN...From 12 PM Saturday to 9 AM MST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could become difficult. A detailed map of the
snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while travelling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON SATURDAY TO 9 AM MST MONDAY
